pieceNameHere.name: Name of the piece
pieceNameHere.startSide: 5x5 grid corresponding to the piece's starting side
pieceNameHere.flipSide: 5x5 grid corresponding to the piece's non starting side
pieceNameHere.game?: OPTIONAL: The game the piece is from
pieceNameHere.ability?: OPTIONAL: Number corresponding to the number ability of the piece
pieceNameHere.number?: OPTIONAL: The number of instances of this piece in the game for one side, defaults to 1 if not present
pieceNameHere.isTerrain?: OPTIONAL: Is the piece terrain, defaults to true
